text: Live at the Hotel Seville is a live album recorded by the folk rock group, The Lovin' Spoonful at the Hotel Seville in Harrison Arkansas. It was released on November 2, 1999 on the Varèse Sarabande label. ==Musicians== *Joe Butler - vocals, guitars, autoharp, percussion *Jerry Yester - guitars, vocals *Lena Yester - keyboards, vocals *Steve Boone - bass *Mike Arturi - drums ==Track listing== # You Didn't Have to Be So Nice # Never Goin' Back # Nashville Cats # Fishin' Blues # Jugband Music # Younger Girl # Full Measure # Didn't Want To Have To Do It # Did You Ever Have to Make Up Your Mind? # Six O'Clock # Daydream # Summer in the City # Do You Believe In Magic # Henry Thomas # Don't You Just Know It Category:1999 live albums Category:The Lovin' Spoonful albums
title: Live at the Hotel Seville
